translation.commissioning-hero-subtitle: Fund the build of your unique tool, receive a perpetual-use license, and watch your tool evolve in the catalog for others to benefit.
translation.commissioning-what-we-build-business-tex: Custom solutions for your unique business workflows: digitize processes, create specialized tools, or build apps that solve specific challenges your business faces.
translation.commissioning-what-we-build-personal-tex: Custom apps for personal use: productivity tools, lifestyle utilities, creative applications, and specialized software that fits your unique needs and preferences.
translation.commissioning-what-we-build-games-text: Interactive games and playful experiences, from simple browser games to more complex projects. Bring your game ideas to life with custom mechanics and engaging gameplay.
translation.commissioning-what-we-build-educational-: Learning apps, training simulators, interactive educational experiences, and tools that make teaching and learning more engaging and effective.
translation.commissioning-audience-business-text: Running a business with unique processes that off-the-shelf software can't handle? Commission a custom solution tailored to how you actually work, whether you're a service provider, retailer, consultant, or creative professional.
translation.commissioning-audience-families-text: Have a personal project idea or need a tool that doesn't exist yet? Whether you're organizing family life, pursuing a hobby, or solving a personal challenge, we can turn your concept into a working app.
translation.commissioning-audience-nonprofits-text: Looking for affordable custom software? Commission a tool that fits your budget and mission: volunteer coordination, donation tracking, or event management.
translation.commissioning-audience-professionals-tex: Want to streamline your work? Commission a tool that automates repetitive tasks: invoice generation, time tracking, or client communication workflows.
translation.commissioning-step-1-text: We start with a Personal Project Intake (CHF 20, credited toward your project). We'll have a conversation to understand your needs, goals, and timeline. You'll receive a clear quote and timeline.
translation.commissioning-step-2-text: We'll build your tool over the agreed timeline, with regular check-ins, progress updates, and demos so you can see progress and provide feedback. You'll have access to feedback loops, iteration cycles, technical support during development, and can request changes within project scope.
translation.commissioning-step-3-text: You receive your complete, functional tool ready for deployment, with deployment support and documentation. You get a full perpetual-use license agreement and access to the application (source code access is not included).
translation.commissioning-step-4-text: We polish and adapt your tool for the public catalog (included in commission), growing our collection organically. Know that your investment helps make custom software more accessible to others.
translation.commissioning-pricing-simple-description: Perfect for personal tools, simple automations, focused utilities. I'll build your tool over 1-2 weeks, with regular check-ins so you can see progress.
translation.commissioning-pricing-standard-descripti: Perfect for small business tools, multi-feature apps. I'll build your tool over 2-4 weeks, delivering working features along the way.
translation.commissioning-pricing-complex-descriptio: Perfect for multi-user systems, advanced integrations. I'll build your tool over 6+ weeks, working closely with you to get it right.
translation.commissioning-pricing-feature-commission: Have an idea for a new feature for an existing catalog tool? Commission it and we'll add it to the tool. Beyond simple corrections‚Äîthis is for new functionality specific to the tool.
translation.commissioning-pricing-intake-description: Quick call and questionnaire to scope personal or family projects before issuing a quote.
translation.commissioning-licensing-perpetual-text: You receive a perpetual-use license for your commissioned tool, granting you the right to use it forever with no recurring license fees. If your tool requires recurring payment services (such as databases or APIs), these costs are discussed during project scope and paid at cost.
translation.commissioning-licensing-ip-text: We retain the rights to adapt your tool for the public catalog and share it with others.
translation.commissioning-licensing-updates-text: As the commissioner, you have priority access to new features and enhancements. Simple additions may be added at no cost, while more complex features are priced at reduced rates.
translation.commissioning-licensing-disclaimer-text-: These licensing terms are a summary. The formal commissioning agreement will contain the complete terms and conditions. Your commissioning project is also subject to our
, which cover liability limitations, dispute resolution, and other general terms.
translation.commissioning-intake-description: Ready to bring your custom tool to life? Reach out directly to discuss your project.
translation.payment-method-invoice-tooltip: Payment via bank transfer with QR-bill (1-3 business days)
translation.payment-method-invoice-inperson-tooltip: In-person sessions: Bank transfer with QR-bill (1-3 days)
translation.payment-method-info-both: üí≥ Remote: Stripe (instant) ‚Ä¢ üìÑ In-person: Invoice with QR-bill (1-3 days) ‚Ä¢ Payment method selected during booking
translation.commissioning-intake-note: Our booking system is coming soon. We'll notify you when it's ready!
translation.commissioning-intake-prepare-1: Clear description of your workflow or need
translation.commissioning-intake-prepare-2: Examples or references of similar tools (optional)
translation.commissioning-faq-link-description: Have questions about commissioning, pricing, timelines, or the commissioning process? Visit our comprehensive FAQ page for detailed answers.
translation.commissioning-faq-1-answer: When you commission a tool, you fund its development at artisan rates. You receive a perpetual-use license for your commissioned version, and we retain IP rights to adapt it for the public catalog. Projects are priced based on complexity: Simple apps (1-2 weeks) start at CHF 350-750, Standard apps (2-4 weeks) are CHF 850-1,250, and Complex apps (6+ weeks) are CHF 1,350-1,950.
translation.commissioning-faq-2-question: How do you calculate pricing? Do you bill hourly?
translation.commissioning-faq-2-answer: We bill by project, not by the hour. This means you pay a fixed price for your complete tool, regardless of how long it takes. For context, our pricing works out to approximately CHF 40-50 per hour‚Äîmuch more accessible than typical agency rates of CHF 80-150/hour. This project-based approach gives you predictable costs and ensures we focus on delivering value rather than tracking time.
translation.commissioning-faq-3-question: How many hours per week do you work on my project?
translation.commissioning-faq-3-answer: I typically work 20-25 hours per week on your project. This means a Simple app (1-2 weeks) represents approximately 20-50 hours of focused development time, a Standard app (2-4 weeks) represents 40-100 hours, and a Complex app (6+ weeks) represents 120-150+ hours. You'll receive regular check-ins and progress updates throughout the build process so you can see how things are progressing.
translation.commissioning-faq-6-answer: Yes! We can customize existing catalog tools or adapt them for your specific needs. You can also commission new features for existing catalog tools (CHF 20-150 depending on difficulty). Contact us to discuss your customization requirements and get a quote based on the complexity of the changes needed.
translation.commissioning-faq-8-question: Do you offer payment plans for larger commissions?
translation.commissioning-faq-8-answer: Yes, we can structure payment plans for commissions. We're flexible and can work with you to find a payment schedule that works for your budget. Contact us to discuss options.
translation.commissioning-faq-9-question: What about recurring payment services like databases or APIs?
translation.commissioning-faq-9-answer: If your tool requires recurring payment services (such as databases, APIs, or other monthly services), these costs will be discussed and agreed upon during the project scope phase. You'll pay these costs at cost (no profit margin) as part of the project contract. Once the app is actively used by others (threshold to be determined), we can waive these recurring service costs entirely. This only applies to apps requiring recurring payment services.
translation.commissioning-faq-10-question: What if I need ongoing support after delivery?
translation.commissioning-faq-10-answer: Your commissioned tool receives updates and maintenance during the build process. After delivery, as the commissioner, you have priority access to new features and enhancements. Simple additions may be added at no cost, while more complex features are priced at reduced rates depending on difficulty. This gives you ongoing value from your initial investment. Post-delivery updates and maintenance for your specific commissioned version can be discussed separately. Contact us to discuss ongoing support options.

translation.commissioning-hero-subtitle: Financia la construcci√≥n que necesitas, recibe una licencia de uso perpetuo y observa c√≥mo tu herramienta evoluciona en el cat√°logo para el beneficio de otros.
translation.commissioning-what-we-build-business-tex: Soluciones personalizadas para tus flujos de trabajo √∫nicos de negocio: digitaliza procesos, crea herramientas especializadas o construye aplicaciones que resuelvan desaf√≠os espec√≠ficos que enfrenta tu negocio.
translation.commissioning-what-we-build-personal-tex: Aplicaciones personalizadas para uso personal: herramientas de productividad, utilidades de estilo de vida, aplicaciones creativas y software especializado que se adapta a tus necesidades y preferencias √∫nicas.
translation.commissioning-what-we-build-games-text: Juegos interactivos y experiencias l√∫dicas, desde juegos simples en navegador hasta proyectos m√°s complejos. Da vida a tus ideas de juegos con mec√°nicas personalizadas y jugabilidad atractiva.
translation.commissioning-what-we-build-educational-: Aplicaciones de aprendizaje, simuladores de entrenamiento, experiencias educativas interactivas y herramientas que hacen que la ense√±anza y el aprendizaje sean m√°s atractivos y efectivos.
translation.commissioning-audience-business-text: ¬øDiriges un negocio con procesos √∫nicos que el software est√°ndar no puede manejar? Encarga una soluci√≥n personalizada adaptada a c√≥mo trabajas realmente, ya seas proveedor de servicios, minorista, consultor o profesional creativo.
translation.commissioning-audience-families-text: ¬øTienes una idea de proyecto personal o necesitas una herramienta que a√∫n no existe? Ya sea que est√©s organizando la vida familiar, persiguiendo un hobby o resolviendo un desaf√≠o personal, podemos convertir tu concepto en una aplicaci√≥n funcional.
translation.commissioning-audience-nonprofits-title: Organizaciones Sin Fines de Lucro y Grupos Comunitarios
translation.commissioning-audience-nonprofits-text: ¬øBuscas software personalizado asequible? Encarga una herramienta que se ajuste a tu presupuesto y misi√≥n: coordinaci√≥n de voluntarios, seguimiento de donaciones o gesti√≥n de eventos.
translation.commissioning-audience-professionals-tex: ¬øQuieres optimizar tu trabajo? Encarga una herramienta que automatice tareas repetitivas: generaci√≥n de facturas, seguimiento de tiempo o flujos de trabajo de comunicaci√≥n con clientes.
translation.commissioning-step-1-text: Comenzamos con un Ingreso de Proyecto Personal (CHF 20, acreditado a tu proyecto). Tendremos una conversaci√≥n para entender tus necesidades, objetivos y cronograma. Recibir√°s una cotizaci√≥n clara y un cronograma.
translation.commissioning-step-2-text: Construiremos tu herramienta durante el cronograma acordado, con seguimientos regulares, actualizaciones de progreso y demostraciones para que puedas ver el progreso y proporcionar comentarios. Tendr√°s acceso a bucles de retroalimentaci√≥n, ciclos de iteraci√≥n, soporte t√©cnico durante el desarrollo y puedes solicitar cambios dentro del alcance del proyecto.
translation.commissioning-step-3-text: Recibes tu herramienta completa y funcional lista para despliegue, con soporte de despliegue y documentaci√≥n. Obtienes un acuerdo de licencia de uso perpetuo completo y acceso a la aplicaci√≥n (el acceso al c√≥digo fuente no est√° incluido).
translation.commissioning-step-4-text: Pulimos y adaptamos tu herramienta para el cat√°logo p√∫blico (incluido en el encargo), haciendo crecer nuestra colecci√≥n org√°nicamente. Ten en cuenta que tu inversi√≥n ayuda a hacer que el software personalizado sea m√°s accesible para otros.
translation.commissioning-pricing-simple-description: Perfecto para herramientas personales, automatizaciones simples, utilidades enfocadas. Construir√© tu herramienta durante 1-2 semanas, con seguimientos regulares para que puedas ver el progreso.
translation.commissioning-pricing-standard-descripti: Perfecto para herramientas de peque√±as empresas, aplicaciones con m√∫ltiples funciones. Construir√© tu herramienta durante 2-4 semanas, entregando funciones que funcionan en el camino.
translation.commissioning-pricing-complex-descriptio: Perfecto para sistemas multi-usuario, integraciones avanzadas. Construir√© tu herramienta durante 6+ semanas, trabajando estrechamente contigo para que sea perfecta.
translation.commissioning-pricing-feature-commission: ¬øTienes una idea para una nueva caracter√≠stica en una herramienta existente del cat√°logo? Enc√°rgala y la agregaremos a la herramienta. M√°s all√° de correcciones simples‚Äîesto es para nueva funcionalidad espec√≠fica de la herramienta.
translation.commissioning-pricing-intake-description: Llamada r√°pida y cuestionario para delinear proyectos personales o familiares antes de emitir una cotizaci√≥n.
translation.commissioning-licensing-perpetual-text: Recibes una licencia de uso perpetuo para tu herramienta encargada, otorg√°ndote el derecho de usarla para siempre sin tarifas de licencia recurrentes. Si tu herramienta requiere servicios de pago recurrentes (como bases de datos o APIs), estos costos se discuten durante el alcance del proyecto y se pagan al costo.

translation.commissioning-licensing-updates-text: Como comisionista, tienes acceso prioritario a nuevas caracter√≠sticas y mejoras. Las adiciones simples pueden agregarse sin costo, mientras que las caracter√≠sticas m√°s complejas tienen precios reducidos.
translation.commissioning-licensing-disclaimer-text-: Estos t√©rminos de licencia son un resumen. El acuerdo formal de encargo contendr√° los t√©rminos y condiciones completos. Tu proyecto de encargo tambi√©n est√° sujeto a nuestros
, que cubren limitaciones de responsabilidad, resoluci√≥n de disputas y otros t√©rminos generales.
translation.commissioning-intake-description: ¬øListo para dar vida a tu herramienta personalizada? Cont√°ctanos directamente para discutir tu proyecto.
translation.commissioning-intake-note: Nuestro sistema de reservas llegar√° pronto. ¬°Te notificaremos cuando est√© listo!
translation.commissioning-intake-prepare-1: Descripci√≥n clara de tu flujo de trabajo o necesidad
translation.commissioning-intake-prepare-2: Ejemplos o referencias de herramientas similares (opcional)
translation.commissioning-faq-link-description: ¬øTienes preguntas sobre encargos, precios, cronogramas o el proceso de encargo? Visita nuestra p√°gina completa de preguntas frecuentes para respuestas detalladas.
translation.commissioning-faq-1-answer: Cuando encargas una herramienta, financias su desarrollo a tarifas artesanales. Recibes una licencia de uso perpetuo para tu versi√≥n encargada, y retenemos los derechos de IP para adaptarla para el cat√°logo p√∫blico. Los proyectos se cotizan seg√∫n la complejidad: Aplicaciones simples (1-2 semanas) desde CHF 350-750, aplicaciones est√°ndar (2-4 semanas) CHF 850-1,250, y aplicaciones complejas (6+ semanas) CHF 1,350-1,950.
translation.commissioning-faq-2-answer: Facturamos por proyecto, no por hora. Esto significa que pagas un precio fijo por tu herramienta completa, sin importar cu√°nto tiempo tome. Para contexto, nuestros precios equivalen aproximadamente a CHF 40-50 por hora‚Äîmucho m√°s accesible que las tarifas t√≠picas de agencias de CHF 80-150/hora. Este enfoque basado en proyectos te da costos predecibles y asegura que nos enfoquemos en entregar valor en lugar de rastrear tiempo.
translation.commissioning-faq-3-question: ¬øCu√°ntas horas por semana trabajas en mi proyecto?
translation.commissioning-faq-3-answer: T√≠picamente trabajo 20-25 horas por semana en tu proyecto. Esto significa que una aplicaci√≥n Simple (1-2 semanas) representa aproximadamente 20-50 horas de tiempo de desarrollo enfocado, una aplicaci√≥n Est√°ndar (2-4 semanas) representa 40-100 horas, y una aplicaci√≥n Compleja (6+ semanas) representa 120-150+ horas. Recibir√°s seguimientos regulares y actualizaciones de progreso durante todo el proceso de construcci√≥n para que puedas ver c√≥mo van las cosas.
translation.commissioning-faq-6-answer: ¬°S√≠! Podemos personalizar herramientas existentes del cat√°logo o adaptarlas para tus necesidades espec√≠ficas. Tambi√©n puedes encargar nuevas caracter√≠sticas para herramientas existentes del cat√°logo (CHF 20-150 seg√∫n la dificultad). Cont√°ctanos para discutir tus requisitos de personalizaci√≥n y obtener una cotizaci√≥n basada en la complejidad de los cambios necesarios.
translation.commissioning-faq-8-question: ¬øOfrecen planes de pago para encargos m√°s grandes?
translation.commissioning-faq-8-answer: S√≠, podemos estructurar planes de pago para encargos. Somos flexibles y podemos trabajar contigo para encontrar un cronograma de pago que funcione para tu presupuesto. Cont√°ctanos para discutir opciones.
translation.commissioning-faq-9-question: ¬øQu√© pasa con los servicios de pago recurrentes como bases de datos o APIs?
translation.commissioning-faq-9-answer: Si tu herramienta requiere servicios de pago recurrentes (como bases de datos, APIs u otros servicios mensuales), estos costos se discutir√°n y acordar√°n durante la fase de alcance del proyecto. Pagar√°s estos costos al costo (sin margen de ganancia) como parte del contrato del proyecto. Una vez que la aplicaci√≥n sea utilizada activamente por otros (umbral a determinar), podemos renunciar por completo a estos costos de servicio recurrentes. Esto solo se aplica a aplicaciones que requieren servicios de pago recurrentes.
translation.commissioning-faq-10-question: ¬øQu√© pasa si necesito soporte continuo despu√©s de la entrega?
translation.commissioning-faq-10-answer: Tu herramienta encargada recibe actualizaciones y mantenimiento durante el proceso de construcci√≥n. Despu√©s de la entrega, como comisionista, tienes acceso prioritario a nuevas caracter√≠sticas y mejoras. Las adiciones simples pueden agregarse sin costo, mientras que las caracter√≠sticas m√°s complejas tienen precios reducidos seg√∫n la dificultad. Esto te brinda valor continuo de tu inversi√≥n inicial. Las actualizaciones y mantenimiento posteriores a la entrega para tu versi√≥n encargada espec√≠fica pueden discutirse por separado. Cont√°ctanos para discutir opciones de soporte continuo.

translation.commissioning-step-4-text: Nous polissons et adaptons votre outil pour le catalogue public (inclus dans la commande), faisant cro√Ætre notre collection organiquement. Sachez que votre investissement aide √† rendre les logiciels personnalis√©s plus accessibles aux autres.

Si votre outil n√©cessite des services de paiement r√©currents (tels que bases de donn√©es ou APIs), ces co√ªts sont discut√©s pendant la port√©e du projet et pay√©s au co√ªt.

translation.commissioning-licensing-disclaimer-text-: Ces conditions de licence sont un r√©sum√©. L'accord formel de commande contiendra les termes et conditions complets. Votre projet de commande est √©galement soumis √† nos
, qui couvrent les limitations de responsabilit√©, la r√©solution des diff√©rends et d'autres conditions g√©n√©rales.
translation.commissioning-intake-description: Pr√™t √† donner vie √† votre outil personnalis√© ? Contactez-nous directement pour discuter de votre projet.
translation.commissioning-intake-note: Notre syst√®me de r√©servation arrive bient√¥t. Nous vous informerons lorsqu'il sera pr√™t !
translation.commissioning-intake-prepare-1: Description claire de votre flux de travail ou besoin
translation.commissioning-faq-link-description: Vous avez des questions sur les commandes, les prix, les d√©lais ou le processus de commande? Visitez notre page FAQ compl√®te pour des r√©ponses d√©taill√©es.
translation.commissioning-faq-1-answer: Lorsque vous commandez un outil, vous financez son d√©veloppement aux tarifs artisanaux. Vous recevez une licence d'utilisation perp√©tuelle pour votre version command√©e, et nous conservons les droits de propri√©t√© intellectuelle pour l'adapter au catalogue public. Les projets sont tarif√©s selon la complexit√© : Applications simples (1-2 semaines) √† partir de CHF 350-750, applications standard (2-4 semaines) CHF 850-1,250, et applications complexes (6+ semaines) CHF 1,350-1,950.
translation.commissioning-faq-2-question: Comment calculez-vous les prix? Facturez-vous √† l'heure?
